Today in Caithness, it's looking solid with 6 ft @9s N swell and a moderate 12 mph N wind. Point of Ness and Murkle Point are great picks, especially from 11:01 to 16:27. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 4 ft @9s NE with fresh 27 mph SSE winds, making it poor across the board. Day after brings a nice rebound with 6 ft @13s WNW and light 9 mph S winds, perfect for a fun session at spots like Point of Ness and Murkle Point. Best: day after.
